title: Casimir Effect in Background of Static Domain Wall
abstract: In this paper we investigate the vacuum expectation values of energy- momentum tensor for conformally coupled scalar field in the standard parallel plate geometry with Dirichlet boundary conditions and on background of planar domain wall case. First we calculate the vacuum expectation values of energy-momentum tensor by using the mode sums, then we show that corresponding properties can be obtained by using the conformal properties of the problem. The vacuum expectation values of energy-momentum tensor contains two terms which come from the boundary conditions and the the gravitational background. In the Minkovskian limit our results agree with those obtained in [3].
